com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.utils

Class DynamicThemeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.utils.DynamicThemeUtils

  • public class DynamicThemeUtils
extends Object
    Helper class to perform theme operations.

      • getCornerDrawable

        public static Drawable getCornerDrawable(float cornerRadius,
                                         int color,
                                         boolean topOnly)
        Returns a corner drawable which can be used for the theme preview header.
        Parameters:
        cornerRadius - The corner size in dip for the drawable.
        color - The color for the drawable.
        topOnly - true to round the top corners only.

      • getCornerDrawableLegacy

        public static Drawable getCornerDrawableLegacy(int width,
                                               int height,
                                               float cornerRadius,
                                               int color,
                                               boolean topOnly)
        Returns a corner drawable which can be used for the theme preview header.
        Parameters:
        width - The width in dip for the drawable.
        height - The height in dip for the drawable.
        cornerRadius - The corner size in dip for the drawable.
        color - The color for the drawable.
        topOnly - true to round the top corners only.

        Returns a corner drawable which can be used for the theme preview header.
